title: James Ferrell
description: James Ferrell is a UX developer in Boston, MA. This is his portfolio site. He doesn’t usually talk in the third person like this.
keywords: design, web design, ui design, visual design, development, developer, website, webdev, frontend, front-end, branding, identity, kirby cms, sketch, boston, tampa, freelance, contract, responsive, accessibility, accessible, a11y, 508, mobile, phone, tablet, react, vue, javascript, vanilla, css, scss, sass, postcss, es6, gulp, grunt, git
ctaHeading: Do I sound like someone you’d like to work with?
ctaText: I’m happy to chat about a new project, or whatever. Let’s grab a coffee.
